people_also_ask.heading: It will join the classic SNES games for Nintendo Switch Online subscribers, along with Natsume Championship Wrestling and NES title The Immortal.15-Jul-2020
people_also_ask.title: Donkey Kong Country comes to Switch - CNET

people_also_ask.heading: Donkey Kong Island, also known as DK Island and Kong Isle, is the home of the Kong Family, many of their Animal Buddies, and several of their enemies. It is also the location where many games in the Donkey Kong series take place.
people_also_ask.title: Donkey Kong Island

people_also_ask.heading: Miyamoto used "donkey" to convey "stubborn" in English; while "Kong" was just a generic term for large apes in Japan, the name Donkey Kong was intended to convey "stubborn ape" to the American audience. When he suggested this name to Nintendo of America, people laughed, but the name stuck.
people_also_ask.title: Donkey Kong (character) - Wikipedia
